name: The Late Hero
description:
The game is about lazy hero with awesome horse in pursuit of the dragon.

Move through the way with so many obstacle and try to beat the dragon

This game was made as an entry for JamGoJam DNA 6.

JAM STUFF

Criteria #1: Endless Runner

The game is an endless runner with a simple level generation algorithm, the aim is having fun and getting the highest score.

Criteria #2: Fantasy

The game theme is set on medieval fantasy time, with classic knight and Dragon

Criteria #3: Devil May Care

The player will hit some special obstacle and go to the reckless mode

Criteria #4: Epic Music

The game features a background music with epic feel into it.

ASSETS

almost all assets, including music and sound effects were made during the game jam period

Tools used : Unity, Blender, Photoshop & Fruity Loops

Font used : Broadway and Arial

Asset that not created during game jam :

Horse squeeking sound - source -
